meaningMnemonic: Move your <radical>coat rack</radical> in one <radical>direction</radical> by shooting it with a <radical>gun</radical>. Then you can keep shooting it to get a good <kanji>rotation</kanji> going. If you think there is a better way to make your coat rack make <kanji>revolution</kanji>s, you're probably wrong.
readingMnemonic: As you watch your coat rack's <kanji>rotation</kanji>s a <reading>cen</reading>taur (せん) barges in and takes the gun from you, stops the rotating coat rack and leaves. How rude! I guess centaurs don't like when things rotate.
